name: Hampton Inn Phoenix/Scottsdale at Shea Blvd

reviews.text: Excellent value for the price! Very helpful staff and modern decor. Wide varierty of hot breakfast items as well as continental options. Ver comfortable bed and quiet sleeping conditions. We will definitely come back and DO recommend this location to everyone.
reviews.title: Great place to stay
Thank you for making my medical stay more comfortable
reviews.text: Hampton Inn is listed on the Arizona Cancer Care Center handouts as an excellent place to stay for out of towners while having extended medical treatment. The shuttle drivers get you to and from appointments on time. The breakfasts are excellent and the entrees change every day. There is a microwave and refrgerator in every room at no extra cost. The duvet covers on the comforters are washed and clean for every new stay. Hampton Inn staff were always smiling and helpful and made a tough time not so tough.

In all aspects, "Outstanding" with excellent location and service to the vistor. The lady from kitchen to the people who cleans the rooms, always have a smile on their face. Having the "Van" available for trips into town and also taken my wife to LSI was a complete gift, not to mention Albert's kindness and smiles. In my opinion he's certainly a big plus to this business!
reviews.title: Hampton is Service!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My stay at the Hampton was great! Devin was very helpful when I booked my room made me feel at home. My lady and I had an amazing time we really enjoyed the room and all that it offered. We really enjoyed the bed tray. Thank you so much Devin and Jody for all your help and assistance.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Hampton Inn. My wife and I stay at them regularly. In fact I'm at one as I write this review. Hampton Inn Phoenix/Scottsdale at Shea Blvd is below par. The place is shabby. The walls need a good paint job, the walcovering needs to be changed. The A/C in our room was noisy (rattled case when compressor engaged). The shower drain didn't drain very well. By he time the shower was finished I was tanding in 3 inches of water. The tile piece next to the tub/shower was missing and wall covering was lose. The woodwork is showing the years and even the doors have damages to their finish. Time to update!
reviews.title: Needs updating

reviews.text: This hotel is in a good location, accepts pets without adding huge extra fees, the staff are nice and friendly. They offer a nice clean pool, grassy area, pet potty areas with baggies and trash sites. The rooms are pretty clean, beds are comfortable and clean, the TV's and internet work well. The breakfast is pretty standard continental. During this stay in July 2013 I had a run in with a service repair man, but I imagine they have a hard time keeping up with empty and full rooms while making their rounds. A good stay at a good price.
reviews.title: Another good stay

reviews.text: Hotel is conventiently located, is clean and rooms were fine. Value of room was great. Only downside is that the air conditioner is right next to the desk so if you are working inside on a hot day (112), it blows right on you.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn, Scottsdale, AZ

reviews.text: I recommend. The price is right and the hotel has everything we needed for a trip to visit family and have a great place to sleep. The breakfast was satisfactory and convenient, and the location is right in the middle of Scottsdale, and not far from the beltway. No complaints and we expect to return next time we come out.
reviews.title: Nice quiet hotel

reviews.text: Nothing outstanding, but comfortable. Nice beds, clean rooms and bathrooms. Great maid service, but wish the front desk staff could have been a little more personable. Breakfast could use some work on over-cooked eggs, but again kitchen staff was the friendliest. I would stay again.
reviews.title: Accomadating

reviews.text: Stayed here recently on a business trip with my wife and it lived up to the standard set by Hampton and other hotels in the chain. The hotel was easy to find and located in a nice, safe area. Inside, the lobby, breakfast area and room was all clean and well kept. The room was spacious and beds comfy with plenty of pillows. Overall, it was a short, but pleasant stay, and if I'm in the area again, I will choose to stay here.
reviews.title: Stands up to the Hampton standard

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hampton Inn is located within walking distance of everything you need. Morning breakfast is excellent. The staff is very friendly. The pool area is enjoyable. The hotel does need to update the rooms and air conditioning system, but overall it is a good place to stay. The beds are very comfortable. The shower pressure and water temp is excellent.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My fiance and I travel from time to time and I work in the hospitality industry. I know what to expect at a hotel and he does too. I just want to be enthusiastic about the beds--- they were super comfortable! We had a king and slept like babies! The breakfast was nice to have different options in the chafing dish each day. One day it was scrambled eggs with some cheese and ham with sasuage patties and the other day it was veggie omelettes with French toast sticks. Staff was very nice! Highly recommended!
reviews.title: Short, sweet stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great place to stay, Central to everything. Great staff and very clean rooms. Best coffee and it is available all day. Enjoyed this hotel on several visits and found it to be consistently great every time. Would stay here again.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: This is an excellent hotel to stay at. The rooms were very nice, the staff was very excellent and very accommodating. We stayed with our dog and there was no hesitation of the pet friendly. The breakfast was excellent. Overall a great stay and I would definitely recommend and stay there again. Thank you.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.text: Love this Hampton Inn! Always neat and clean. Staff is friendly & helpful. Free breakfast is "just right," with lovely staff to assist you. Salt water pool is perfect! Like swimming in a bath tub! AAAAAHHHHHHH!
reviews.title: Always a great value

reviews.text: I stay in Phoenix over 100 nights a year. This hotel had the noisiest A/C unit I have ever experienced. Also the walls were paper thin, so you could not only hear doors closing in the next room, you could feel the shudder in your bed.
reviews.title: Thin walls, noisy A/C, nice people

reviews.text: Staff was very nice though, location is good, and facility is clean.
reviews.title: Excellent Service Great Hotel

reviews.text: I had a wonderful stay!! The entire hotel staff was so helpful and friendly from the front desk staff to the housekeeping and maintenance!! I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area. The lobby is nice and cozy. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. Pool is great!
reviews.title: Business in Phoenix

reviews.text: I was recently in Phoenix for business training. This hotel was a nice quiet home away from home for the week. I could grab coffee and a light hot breakfast before I left for the morning and wasn't back until the evening to read and rest,
reviews.title: Not the usual Hampton Inn

reviews.text: I have stayed at several Hampton Inns. This one the room was rather small. I would expect that in New York city which truly is the case. But this is Arizona, I didn't expect the room to be so small. I felt like I was staying at a motel. I usually like staying at Hampton Inn because it is a great value for all that you get. Everything else was fine.
reviews.title: Friendly and efficient Hampton Inn Scottsdale

aka: Hampton Inn Phoenix/Scottsdale At Shea Blvd Hotel
